channel.title: 脑影像人工智能 on NWPU BBIC
channel.description: Recent content in 脑影像人工智能 on NWPU BBIC

item.title: 期刊CIBM发表论文：通过自监督graph transformer识别大脑网络中的关键节点
item.description: 论文 “Identifying influential nodes in brain networks via self-supervised graph-transformer” 在期刊《Computers in Biology and Medicine》 (CIBM) 发表

item.title: 顶会MICCAI 2023发表论文：基于自监督Graph-Transformer探索大脑功能结构连接体骨架
item.description: 论文 “Exploring Brain Function-Structure Connectome Skeleton via Self-Supervised Graph-Transformer Approach” 被会议MICCAI 2023接收

item.title: 顶会MICCAI 2023发表论文：用于识别共同和一致的三铰链标志的功能和结构特征联合表示
item.description: 论文 “Joint Representation of Functional and Structural Profiles for Identifying Common and Consistent 3-Hinge Gyral Folding Landmark” 被会议MICCAI 2023接收

item.title: 会议ISBI发表论文：通过强化学习方法探索大脑连接中枢的新型多模态框架
item.description: 论文“A NOVEL MULTI-MODALITY FRAMEWORK FOR EXPLORING BRAIN CONNECTIVITY HUBS VIA REINFORCEMENT LEARNING APPROACH”被会议 “IEEE International Symposium on Biomedical Imaging”接收

item.title: 期刊Frontiers in Human Neuroscience发表论文：基于自然功能磁共振成像对大脑时空模式细粒度解释的混合学习框架
item.description: 论文“A hybrid learning framework for fine-grained interpretation of brain spatiotemporal patterns during naturalistic functional magnetic resonance imaging”被期刊Frontiers in Human Neuroscience接收

item.title: 会议MLMI 2023发表论文：两阶段多视图低秩稀疏子空间聚类方法探索脑功能与结构之间的关系
item.description: 论文 “A Novel Two-Stage Multi-View Low-Rank Sparse Subspace Clustering Approach to Explore the Relationship between Brain Function and Structure” 被会议Machine Learning in Medical Imaging (MLMI, MICCAI Workshop)接收
